name: Case Opener Simulator for CSGO
description:
Welcome to Counter Strike Case Simulator!

If you're reading this you're obviously a CS:GO fan and this is a must have app for you. This app allows you to play around with case openings and simulate what you would receive. It gives you the fun of case opening without having to spend real money on cases and keys. There is also a trade-up contract simulator so after you open some cases, you can trade up your skins.

Try it out yourself, download the best CS:GO case simulator app now!
